institutes.pageDescription: Discover AHEU's three specialized institutes offering diverse academic programs in pedagogy, business, law, economics, statistics, IT, design and technology.

hero.title: Academic Institutes
hero.subtitle: Excellence in specialized education through our three institutes

institutes.sectionSubtitle: AHEU offers diverse academic programs through three specialized institutes, each focusing on distinct fields of study

callToAction.title: Find Your Program
callToAction.description: Explore our diverse range of programs across all three institutes to find the perfect fit for your academic and career goals.

pedagogy.name: Institute of Pedagogy, Business and Law
pedagogy.imageAlt: Students in a business lecture hall
pedagogy.shortDescription: Training specialists in education, business management, and legal studies with an emphasis on practical skills.
pedagogy.description1: The Institute of Pedagogy, Business and Law is dedicated to preparing professionals in the fields of education, business administration, and legal studies. Our programs combine theoretical knowledge with practical applications to ensure graduates are ready for the demands of their chosen careers.
pedagogy.description2: With a faculty of experienced educators, business professionals, and legal experts, the institute provides a rich learning environment that encourages critical thinking, ethical decision-making, and leadership development.

economics.name: Institute of Economics, Statistics and IT Technologies
economics.imageAlt: Students in an IT computer laboratory
economics.shortDescription: Developing professionals in economics, statistics, data science, and information technology for the digital economy.
economics.description1: The Institute of Economics, Statistics and IT Technologies prepares students for careers in the rapidly evolving fields of economics, data analysis, and information technology. Our programs emphasize analytical skills, technological proficiency, and economic reasoning.
economics.description2: The institute prides itself on staying at the forefront of technological advancements and economic research, ensuring our graduates are equipped with cutting-edge knowledge and skills valued by employers in both the public and private sectors.

symbat.name: "Symbat" Institute of Design and Technology
symbat.imageAlt: Design students working in a studio
symbat.shortDescription: Fostering creativity and innovation in design, fashion, textiles, and technology for the creative industries.
symbat.description1: The "Symbat" Institute of Design and Technology is a center for creative excellence, where artistic vision meets practical application. Our programs nurture creative talent while providing the technical skills needed for success in design, fashion, and related industries.
symbat.description2: With state-of-the-art design studios, technology labs, and experienced faculty from the creative industries, Symbat offers a dynamic learning environment that encourages experimentation, innovation, and professional development.

programs.pageDescription: Explore AHEU's comprehensive range of undergraduate and graduate programs across our three specialized institutes.

about.pageDescription: Learn about Almaty Humanitarian Economic University's mission, history, leadership, accreditation, and achievements.

hero.title: About AHEU
hero.subtitle: Delivering quality education and fostering innovation since 1995

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.content1: Almaty Humanitarian Economic University is dedicated to providing accessible, high-quality education that prepares students to be leaders in their fields, contributing to the economic and social development of Kazakhstan and the global community.
mission.content2: We strive to create an inclusive learning environment that fosters critical thinking, creativity, and ethical decision-making through innovative teaching methods, research opportunities, and practical experiences.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.content: To be recognized as a leading educational institution in Central Asia, known for academic excellence, innovative research, and producing graduates who are prepared to meet the challenges of a rapidly changing world.

items.excellence: Excellence in teaching, research, and institutional operations
items.integrity: Integrity and ethics in all academic and professional activities
items.innovation: Innovation in curriculum development and teaching methodologies
items.diversity: Diversity and inclusion in our academic community
items.sustainability: Sustainability and social responsibility in all our endeavors

history.title: Our History
history.content1: Established in 1995, Almaty Humanitarian Economic University has grown from a small institution focused on economics and business education to a comprehensive university offering a wide range of programs across three specialized institutes.
history.content2: Throughout our history, we have remained committed to adapting to the changing needs of society and the job market, continually updating our programs and teaching methods to provide students with the knowledge and skills needed for success.

leadership.title: Leadership
leadership.intro: AHEU is led by distinguished academics and professionals committed to maintaining the highest standards of education and institutional excellence.

rector.name: Prof. Askar Nurbekov
rector.title: Rector
rector.bio: Professor Nurbekov has led AHEU since 2015. With over 30 years of experience in higher education, he has been instrumental in the university's development and international recognition. He holds a PhD in Economics from Moscow State University and has published extensively on economic development and education policy.

viceRector.name: Dr. Elmira Suleimenova
viceRector.title: Vice Rector for Academic Affairs
viceRector.bio: Dr. Suleimenova oversees all academic programs and faculty development at AHEU. With a background in educational leadership and a PhD from Cambridge University, she has implemented numerous innovations in curriculum development and teaching methodologies.

accreditation.title: Accreditation & Licensing
accreditation.content1: AHEU is fully accredited by the Ministry of Education and Science of the Republic of Kazakhstan and has received institutional and program accreditation from independent quality assurance agencies.
accreditation.content2: Our commitment to maintaining high academic standards is reflected in our ongoing process of self-assessment and external review.

bodies.iaar: Independent Agency for Accreditation and Rating
bodies.iqaa: Independent Agency for Quality Assurance in Education

rankings.title: Rankings & Recognition
rankings.content: AHEU takes pride in its recognition among Kazakhstan's leading universities and continues to work toward higher international rankings.

national.title: National Ranking
national.description: AHEU is consistently ranked among the top 20 universities in Kazakhstan for humanities and economic education.

qsRanking.title: QS Regional Ranking
qsRanking.description: AHEU is included in the QS Eastern Europe and Central Asia University Rankings, recognizing our growing reputation in the region.

programRankings.title: Program-Specific Rankings
programRankings.description: Several of our programs, particularly in business, economics, and design, are highly ranked nationally for graduate employment outcomes and academic quality.

callToAction.title: Join Our Academic Community
callToAction.description: Experience the AHEU difference with our quality education, expert faculty, and vibrant campus environment.

howToApply.title: How to Apply
howToApply.subtitle: Follow our step-by-step application process to join AHEU

undergraduate.title: Undergraduate Admissions
undergraduate.intro: Join our bachelor's degree programs through the following process:

step1.title: Check Requirements
step1.description: Ensure you meet the admission requirements, including high school diploma and UNT scores.

step2.title: Prepare Documents
step2.description: Gather your identification, educational certificates, and other required documents.

step3.title: Submit Application
step3.description: Complete the online application form and upload all required documents.

step4.title: Receive Decision
step4.description: Await the admissions committee's decision, which is typically made within 2-3 weeks.

graduate.title: Graduate Admissions
graduate.intro: Join our master's and doctoral programs through the following process:

step1.title: Check Requirements
step1.description: Ensure you meet the admission requirements, including bachelor's degree and entrance exam scores.

step2.title: Prepare Documents
step2.description: Gather your identification, educational certificates, CV, and other required documents.

step3.title: Submit Application
step3.description: Complete the online application form, upload all required documents, and pay the application fee.

international.title: International Admissions
international.intro: International students can join AHEU through the following process:

step1.title: Check Requirements
step1.description: Ensure you meet the admission requirements for international students, including educational qualifications and language proficiency.

step2.title: Prepare Documents
step2.description: Gather your identification, educational certificates, language proficiency proof, and other required documents.

step3.title: Submit Application
step3.description: Complete the online application form and upload all required documents.

step4.title: Receive Acceptance Letter
step4.description: Once accepted, you will receive an official acceptance letter needed for visa application.

step5.title: Apply for Visa
step5.description: Use the acceptance letter to apply for a student visa at the Kazakhstan embassy or consulate in your country.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about admissions at AHEU

questions.q2: Are scholarships available for international students?
questions.q4: Can I transfer credits from another university?
questions.q5: How do I apply for on-campus housing?

answers.a1: For fall semester admissions, applications should be submitted by June 30. For spring semester, the deadline is December 15. International students are encouraged to apply at least 3 months before these deadlines to allow time for visa processing.
answers.a2: Yes, AHEU offers several scholarships for international students based on academic merit, financial need, and country-specific agreements. The International Admissions Office can provide detailed information about available scholarships and application procedures.
answers.a3: Programs taught in English require an IELTS score of 6.0 or TOEFL iBT score of 75. Programs taught in Russian require a TORFL level 1 certificate. Kazakh-medium programs require documented proficiency in Kazakh. Language requirements may be waived for native speakers.
answers.a4: Yes, AHEU accepts transfer credits from accredited institutions. Credits are evaluated on a course-by-course basis by the relevant academic department. Official transcripts and course descriptions must be submitted for evaluation.
answers.a5: On-campus housing applications are submitted separately from admissions applications. Once accepted to AHEU, you can apply for housing through the Student Affairs Office. Housing is allocated on a first-come, first-served basis, so early application is recommended.

callToAction.title: Ready to Apply?
callToAction.description: Take the first step toward your future at AHEU. Our admissions team is ready to assist you throughout the application process.
